title: Australia Dances
abstract: A collection of short films, home movies and documentaries about ballet presented by the National Film and Sound Archive.
description: Featuring films from the National Film and Sound Archive, these selected titles illustrate this classical dance form as characterised by its grace and precision of movement. The package includes unique footage from the world renowned Ballet Russes and Borovansky Ballet, and also explores the development of Australia's dance companies and early choreography.
